original: @62b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @62b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: bsgrub bya rengs par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: bsgrub bya rengs par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: A practitioner who has taken the commitments and who wishes to paralyze the victim

original: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas sngon du sarba sha tr'um h'um zhes pa la bsnyen pa 'du ma phrag bdun bskyal nas /
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas sngon du sarba sha tr'um h'um zhes pa la bsnyen pa 'du ma phrag bdun bskyal nas /
translated: should recite the mantra SARVA ŚATRUṂ HŪṂ, with the pride of Ārya Vajravidāraṇa, until the signs of accomplishment appear.

original: de nas nya gro dha'i lo ma la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas ce spyang gi khrag dang bsres nas bsgrub bya'i lus la reg par gtor na nges par rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nya gro dha'i lo ma la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas ce spyang gi khrag dang bsres nas bsgrub bya'i lus la reg par gtor na nges par rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having enchanted a leaf of the nyagrodha tree one hundred and eight times, he should mix it with the blood of a jackal and sprinkle it on the body of the victim. He will certainly be paralyzed.

original: sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa'i las jag chings 'phrul yig ces bya ba /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa'i las jag chings 'phrul yig ces bya ba /
translated: The rite of paralyzing all beings called the magical spell of binding the bandit

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
